price: Hai saudara perempuan Hārūn 902, ayahmu sekali-kali bukanlah seorang yang jahat dan ibumu sekali-kali bukanlah seorang pezina",
arabic: يَٰٓأُخۡتَ هَٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمۡرَأَ سَوۡءٖ وَمَا كَانَتۡ أُمُّكِ بَغِيّٗا
footnotes: 902.  Maryam dipanggil "saudara perempuan Hārūn" karena ia seorang wanita yang saleh seperti kesalehan Nabi Hārūn ‘Alaihissalām.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāukh'ta hārūna mā kāna abūki im'ra-a sawin wamā kānat ummuki baghiyyan
